item.title: 317 adding custom whips
item.dc:creator: @TheGodzGang TheGodzGang
item.description:
@TheGodzGang wrote:

I had this problem to, so what you are gonna do is very simple…

itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
Change the numbers of this 3 lines till it works, till it stands good in your inv.
I hope this helped you

Read full topic

item.title: 317 adding custom whips
item.dc:creator: @Nicksworld Nicksworld
item.description:
@Nicksworld wrote:

So i’ve added everything to the item.def and item.cfg
but this is what my whip looks like
http://prntscr.com/51zzf0
It’s obviously not picking up the model from the abyssal whip…
here’s the code i used in item.def

case 11685: itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 5409; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5409; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.name = "Lime Whip"; itemDef.description = "A Lime Abyssal Whip".getBytes(); itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 17350; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528; break;

And this is how it’s added in item.cfg

Read full topic
